price: Basi hawataweza kuusia, wala kwa watu wao hawarejei.
arabic: فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ تَوۡصِيَةٗ وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
footnotes: Kwa upesi wa hayo yatakayo wateremkia, hawatowahi kuusia chochote, wala kurejea kwa ahali zao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: falā yastaṭīʿūna tawṣiyatan walā ilā ahlihim yarjiʿūna
